title: Traditional Polish doughnuts
ingredients: ['110g fresh yeast', '130g caster sugar', '1kg plain flour', '500ml milk', '1 whole egg', '7 egg yolks', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 tablespoon lemon zest', '1 lemon, juiced', '1 pinch salt', '2 tablespoons vodka or rum', '6 tabespoons vegetable oil', '450g jam (rose petal or strawberry)', '1.5L vegetable oil for frying', '90g icing sugar']
